info.name: Entertainer
info.description: Entertainer background from the Player’s Handbook 2024.
info.author: Wizards of the Coast

li.i: Choose one kind of Musical Instrument

ul.li: Equipment: Choose A or B: (A) Musical Instrument (same as above), 2 Costumes, Mirror, Perfume, Traveler's Clothes, 11 GP; or (B) 50 GP

description.p: You spent much of your youth following roving fairs and carnivals, performing odd jobs for musicians and acrobats in exchange for lessons. You may have learned how to walk a tightrope, how to play a lute in a distinct style, or how to recite poetry with impeccable diction. To this day, you thrive on applause and long for the stage.

setters.set: Strength, Dexterity, Charisma, Musician Feat, Acrobatics and Performance Skills, a Musical Instrument
